requestlist:
Here's a link to the special request list:
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1eP8sh8rtrB_1QY4Ti5muOf4uRXKzbF4fbU_58XiCoEs/edit?usp=sharing
tradecommands:
Here are the trade commands for the bots:

Pokémon  Scarlet Violet - `!svtrade`
Pokémon Sword Shield - `!swshtrade`
Pokémon Legends: Arceus - `!platrade`
Pokémon Brilliant Diamond and Shining Pearl - `!bdsptrade`

Note: You need the ID. So for an example top left raid would be 1addraid ID
